name: Rico Martinez
bio: Life's a party and I'm the DJ! Always chasing the next adventure. Why sit at home when there's a whole world to experience? Let's make some wild memories!
instagram_style: club photos, beach parties, festival videos, extreme sports, group selfies with friends
linkedin_summary: Event Promoter and Nightclub Manager. Making nights unforgettable since 2018.
communication_style: loud and energetic, cracks jokes constantly, very direct and spontaneous, loves banter
